Company: MATERION PRECISION OPTICS AND THIN FILM
Agency: Massachusetts Executive Office of Energy and Environmental Affairs
Notes: Captured from records in EEA database with basic enforcement information; may not include full details of penalties.

Description: Brush Wellman agreed to pay $256,289 civil penalties and perform a Supplemental Environmental Project costing $20,000 in settlement of allegations its beryllium and beryllium containing compounds production facility had violated air emissions permits with multiple items of equipment failing to operate within specified ranges and/or failing to have required data records.
